1011001010000101 1011100100100011 0 -> sum: 0110101110101000, cout: 1

0111011000000011 1010101101111011 1 -> sum: 0010000101111111, cout: 1
1110001001011101 0011000111111011 0 -> sum: 0001010001011000, cout: 1
1010011000110000 1010011110001000 1 -> sum: 0100110110111001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
